Base instrument¶

This is a base class for an instrument (named instrument in PythonForTheLab book).

class hyperion.instrument.base_instrument.BaseInstrument¶

General class for Instrument

finalize()¶

this is to close connection to the device.

idn()¶

Identify command

initialize(port)¶

Starts the connection to the device in port

Parameters:port (string) – port name to connect to
